properties.name: A Park
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly  A very nice alternative to Parco Sempione.

properties.name: A good friend
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyThis is where my friend runs his printing business from.

properties.name: Alcatraz - club
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyFancy a boogie? Try here. And try the pizzeria/restaurant next door.

properties.name: An interesting selection of bars
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly Fancy a drink or a bite to eat? If so, there are several nice bars and a restaurant or two in this area.

properties.name: Banca Intesa - Avoid this branch
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyAvoid this branch of this Italian bank if you need to carry out any foreign currency transactions. The staff are not particularly competent, not all, but many. And you just will not understand where to go.

properties.name: Bar Magenta
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly Young and trendy Bar, not far from the centre. Pay for your drinks before you go to the bar. This bar is open until 2 or so in the morning.

properties.name: Bar Victoria
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly Chic and upmarket bar - vey nice. Frequented by foreingors and Italians alike. Also check out the restaurant next door - good food. Not that cheap.

properties.name: Brera - nice to wander around
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyExpensive, exclusive and attractive area of Milan. Lots of bars and places to eat and drink.

properties.name: Carabinieri - Police station
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalySomeone stolen your passport? Report it here.

properties.name: Cormons - where Gianpietro Carlesso is based.
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly Cormons is where interesting Italian sculptor Gianpietro Carlesso is based. The photo shows an example of his work. If you ever find yourself in the area -look him up!

properties.name: Good photographic equipment shop
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly Need something for your camera? Try here - not sure they speak English, but they are competent and friendly. Well stocked to.

properties.name: Hosptial with a casualty department
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly This hospital is the one nearest the centre of Milan. Go there if you feel ill.

properties.name: Il Castello - the castle
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyMilan\'s castle and museum. Worth a look and a wander around.

properties.name: Italian in-laws
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyThis is the street in which my Italian in-laws reside.

properties.name: La Francesca - Holiday Chalets
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly This is where we went for a short break. It\'s about here.

properties.name: Location of the Paolo Sarpi food and wine fair 2007
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly

properties.name: Me, in Milan
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyThe street in which I reside

properties.name: Naviglio - Canal area of Milan
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyThis is the start of the Naviglio area in Milan. Lots of bars and places open during the August shutdown.

properties.name: Pisa, Italy - watch out!!
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyQuite a few people have been caught out by the restricted traffic zone in this famous Italian city. Be careful about entering the centre of the city by car - even if you have a hotel booking - this does not seem to provide protection....

properties.name: Stazione Centrale - Central Station
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyThe place you will most likely arrive if you come by Train, from Switzerland for example. Hop on the Yellow underground line and get off at the Duomo stop.

properties.name: Traffic fine - Pisa
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyVia Giovanni di Simone - within restricted traffic area Someone who drove in Pisa received a fine while driving down this road.

properties.name: Unicredit Banca - cash machine
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyUse this ATM to get some cash before splashing it in nearby Via Monte Napoleone.

properties.name: Very good bathroom accessory shop
properties.description: Posted by Alexfromitaly If you want to add a little Italian style to your bathroom, check out this shop. Very nice shop and very good presentation. Prices are average for Milan.

properties.name: Via Monte Napoleone
properties.description: Posted by AlexfromitalyGot money to burn on designer labels? Yes. Then spend some time, and money here!

properties.name: australian embassy
properties.description: Posted by SystemVia Antonio Bosio, 5, Rome
